SELECT cp.id, cp.card_type AS cardType, cp.bank_id AS bankId, cp.card_product_name AS cardProductName, cp.card_image_url AS cardImageUrl, cp.annual_fee AS annualFee, cp.issued_date AS issuedDate, cp.required_monthly_spending AS requiredMonthlySpending, COUNT(cb.id) AS benefitCount FROM card_benefit cb JOIN card_product cp ON cb.card_product_id = cp.id GROUP BY cp.id, cp.card_type, cp.bank_id, cp.card_product_name, cp.card_image_url, cp.annual_fee, cp.issued_date, cp.required_monthly_spending
ORDER BY benefitCount DESC, cp.issued_date DESC
